img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球比賽中，球員需頻繁快速抬頭追蹤高遠球或低頭處理網前球。此肌肉協助穩定下顎與舌骨，確保頭部在高頻率的垂直視線切換中保持穩定，有助於視線鎖定羽球。
desc_en: In badminton, players frequently look up to track clears or down for net shots. This muscle helps stabilize the mandible and hyoid, ensuring head stability during rapid vertical visual tracking to keep the eyes locked on the shuttlecock.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責羽毛球揮拍準備動作中的「架拍」（外展）。在殺球或高遠球的引拍階段，將手肘抬高至肩部水平，為後續的鞭打動作創造最佳力臂。
desc_en: Responsible for the 'racket preparation' (abduction) phase. During the backswing for a smash or clear, it lifts the elbow to shoulder level, creating the optimal lever arm for the subsequent whipping motion.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在正手擊球的揮拍過程中協助肩部屈曲與內旋。特別是在網前撲球或平抽擋時，提供快速向前揮動的力量，控制拍面的攻擊角度。
desc_en: Assists in shoulder flexion and internal rotation during forehand strokes. Especially in net kills or drives, it provides rapid forward swing power to control the racket angle for attack.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責反手拍的引拍動作（水平外展）以及殺球後的揮拍減速。強壯的後三角肌能保護肩關節在高速揮空時不被拉傷，對羽球員極為重要。
desc_en: Responsible for backhand preparation (horizontal abduction) and decelerating the arm after a smash. Strong posterior deltoids protect the shoulder joint from strain during high-speed follow-throughs.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 構成口腔底部。在激烈的多拍對抗中，球員吞嚥口水或大口喘氣時，此肌肉協助維持口腔與喉部功能的正常運作。
desc_en: Forms the floor of the mouth. During intense rallies, when players swallow or pant heavily, this muscle assists in maintaining normal oral and laryngeal function.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球大跨步（Lunge）救球時的關鍵肌肉。在深蹲跨步位協助髖伸展將身體推回中心位置，並穩定骨盆防止過度旋轉，是快速回防的基礎。
desc_en: A key muscle for the deep lunge in badminton. Assists hip extension to push the body back to the center from a deep lunge position and stabilizes the pelvis against rotation, forming the basis for quick recovery.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助背闊肌進行強力的肩內旋與內收，是羽毛球殺球（Smash）力量傳導的重要環節。在擊球瞬間協助將手臂從高點快速下拉。
desc_en: Assists the latissimus dorsi in powerful shoulder internal rotation and adduction, a vital link for power transfer in a badminton smash. Helps pull the arm down rapidly from the overhead position at impact.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球握拍的「手指發力」末端。在擊球瞬間，小指的快速緊握（屈曲與內收）能提供球拍槓桿末端的支點，增加擊球的鞭打效果與控制力。
desc_en: The terminal point of 'finger power'. The rapid tightening (flexion and adduction) of the little finger at impact provides a fulcrum at the handle's end, enhancing the whipping effect and control.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在轉換正反手握拍或放鬆球拍準備擊球時，負責快速伸展小指。靈活的小指伸展能讓握拍空間變大，有利於手指在擊球瞬間產生瞬間發力。
desc_en: Responsible for rapidly extending the little finger when switching grips or relaxing the hand before a shot. Flexible extension opens the grip space, facilitating instantaneous finger power generation.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責在握拍時維持小指的屈曲張力。在羽球擊球的「鎖緊」階段，此肌肉與其他手指屈肌協同，確保球拍不會在高速撞擊中脫手。
desc_en: Maintains flexion tension in the little finger while gripping. During the 'locking' phase of a stroke, it works with other flexors to ensure the racket remains secure against high-speed impact.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助手掌形成杯狀以穩固握住球拍柄底。在反手拍發力時，提供小魚際區的穩定性，幫助力量透過手掌根部傳遞至球拍。
desc_en: Helps cup the palm to securely hold the racket butt. During backhand power generation, it provides stability in the hypothenar eminence, aiding force transfer through the heel of the hand.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽球側向急停或跨步時，負責擴大足底支撐面積並抵抗足內翻。對於防止腳踝扭傷（翻腳刀）至關重要，特別是在快速變向移動中。
desc_en: Expands the plantar support area and resists inversion during lateral braking or lunging. Crucial for preventing ankle sprains, especially during rapid directional changes.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 肩袖肌群成員，負責肩外旋。在殺球的準備動作（倒拍）中至關重要，幫助手臂充分外轉以儲存彈性位能，隨後在揮拍中穩定肩關節。
desc_en: A rotator cuff member responsible for external rotation. Critical during the smash preparation (racket drop), allowing the arm to fully rotate externally to store elastic energy.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在激烈的多拍來回中協助強制呼氣。同時作為核心的一部分，在殺球時協助胸廓旋轉與屈曲，將力量從軀幹傳遞至上肢。
desc_en: Assists forced expiration during intense rallies. As part of the core, it aids thoracic rotation and flexion during a smash, transferring power from the trunk to the upper limb.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在殺球發力的瞬間，球員常會不自覺地咬緊牙關，此肌肉會強烈收縮。適度放鬆下顎有助於頸部靈活度，讓頭部能更自由地追蹤球路。
desc_en: Players often subconsciously clench their teeth at the moment of a smash. Relaxing the jaw improves neck flexibility, allowing the head to track the shuttle more freely.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球手腕發力的關鍵肌之一。在揮拍過程中負責手腕的伸展與尺偏（Ulnar Deviation），這是殺球與反手拍鞭打動作中產生最後一擊速度的重要動作。
desc_en: Key muscle for wrist power. Responsible for wrist extension and ulnar deviation during the swing—crucial movements for generating terminal speed in smashes and backhand whips.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助屈腕與尺偏。在殺球壓腕瞬間提供強大的力量，並保護尺側手腕關節。過度使用易導致手腕尺側肌腱炎（羽球肘的相關症狀）。
desc_en: Assists flexion and ulnar deviation. Provides powerful force during the wrist snap of a smash and protects the ulnar side of the wrist. Overuse can lead to ulnar-sided tendonitis.

img_source: Berichard d'après Gray's anatomy, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助腳趾抓地。在羽球頻繁的啟動與急停中，確保腳趾能直線抓地傳遞力量，防止腳掌在鞋內滑動，提高步法精確度。
desc_en: Assists in toe gripping. During frequent starts and stops in badminton, ensures linear toe grip to transfer force, preventing the foot from sliding inside the shoe and improving footwork precision.

img_source: Selket at English Wikipedia, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責前臂的旋前動作。在正手殺球與平抽球中，這是產生「內旋鞭打」力量的深層驅動者，對於擊球速度至關重要。
desc_en: Responsible for forearm pronation. In forehand smashes and drives, it is a deep driver of the 'internal rotation whip,' crucial for generating shot speed.

img_source: Polygon data is generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽球場上的耐力支柱。在長時間的比賽中維持膝蓋彎曲的防守蹲姿，並負責啟動步法（Split Step）時的踝關節剛性，確保存儲彈性位能。
desc_en: The pillar of endurance on court. Maintains the flexed-knee defensive stance during long matches and provides ankle rigidity during the split step, ensuring elastic energy storage.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽球前場跨步救球時，負責控制小腿前伸幅度並保護膝蓋（減速）；在後場起跳殺球時，協助髖部伸展提供垂直跳躍力。
desc_en: Controls tibial advancement and protects the knee (deceleration) during net lunges; assists hip extension to provide vertical jumping power during rear-court jump smashes.

img_source: Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球啟動與煞車時，穩定腳趾關節，防止腳趾過度捲曲（爪狀趾）。確保前腳掌能平穩地傳遞地面反作用力，提升步法穩定性。
desc_en: Stabilizes toe joints during badminton starts and stops, preventing excessive curling (claw toes). Ensures the forefoot can smoothly transfer ground reaction forces, enhancing footwork stability.

img_source: Image:Gray445.png modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球急停轉向時，負責穩定大拇指與橫向足弓。協助足部應對快速變向時產生的巨大剪切力，提升步法效率。
desc_en: Stabilizes the big toe and transverse arch during sudden stops and turns. Helps the foot withstand high shear forces during rapid directional changes, improving footwork efficiency.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球跨步救球時的足弓支撐者。在足部受到劇烈衝擊時防止過度旋前（足弓塌陷），預防足底筋膜炎。
desc_en: Arch supporter during lunges. Prevents excessive pronation (arch collapse) when the foot undergoes high-impact loading, helping to prevent plantar fasciitis.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在使用「蒼蠅拍握法（Panhandle Grip）」封網或撲球時的主要力量來源。負責拇指強壓拍柄，確保拍面穩定向下。
desc_en: Primary power source when using the 'Panhandle Grip' for net kills or taps. Responsible for the thumb pressing strongly against the handle to keep the racket face stable and angled downwards.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助穩定手腕橈側並控制拇指位置。在挑球或推球時，幫助維持手腕與拇指的結構穩定性。
desc_en: Stabilizes the radial side of the wrist and controls thumb positioning. Helps maintain structural stability of the wrist and thumb during lifts or push shots.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責調整拇指在握柄上的位置。在正反手握拍切換時，協助拇指快速移動至寬面或斜棱上，是靈活握拍的基礎。
desc_en: Adjusts thumb position on the handle. Assists in rapidly moving the thumb to the flat or bevel grip during forehand-backhand switches, forming the basis of flexible gripping.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在反手握拍準備時，負責將拇指伸直並貼合拍柄寬面。過度翹起拇指（豎指）會造成前臂僵硬，應保持適度放鬆。
desc_en: Responsible for extending the thumb to align with the flat racket bevel during backhand preparation. Excessive hitchhiking of the thumb causes forearm stiffness and should be kept moderately relaxed.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 配合長肌微調拇指張力。在網前搓球等需要高度手指感覺的技術中，維持拇指的靈敏度與控制力。
desc_en: Works with the longus to fine-tune thumb tension. Maintains thumb sensitivity and control in techniques requiring high finger feel, such as spinning net shots.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 大魚際肌群之一，負責拇指發力按壓拍柄。在正手重殺或平抽時，提供拇指側的穩固支撐。
desc_en: Part of the thenar group, responsible for the thumb pressing against the handle. Provides solid support on the thumb side during heavy forehand smashes or drives.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球靈活轉拍的關鍵。負責拇指與其他手指的對掌動作，使球員能在毫秒間從正手握拍切換至反手握拍。
desc_en: Crucial for flexible racket twirling/switching. Responsible for opposing the thumb to other fingers, enabling players to switch from forehand to backhand grips in milliseconds.

name_zh: 拇趾外展肌（內在肌視角）
img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 足部核心的穩定基石。在羽毛球單腳起跳或落地時，主動控制足型穩定，是預防腳踝扭傷的第一道防線。
desc_en: The cornerstone of foot core stability. Actively controls foot shape stability during single-leg jumps or landings, acting as the first line of defense against ankle sprains.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽球後場起跳殺球時負責屈膝與髖伸展，提供垂直跳躍動力。落地時協助吸收衝擊，並在網前撲球急停時保護膝關節，防止過度前移。
desc_en: Provides hip extension and knee flexion for vertical power during rear-court jump smashes. Absorbs shock upon landing and protects the knee from excessive anterior translation during sudden net stops.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 提供羽球跳躍動作的垂直推力。在全場跑動中，不斷進行離心收縮以吸收單腳著地時的體重與地面反作用力，是耐力考驗極大的肌肉。
desc_en: Provides vertical thrust for badminton jumps. During full-court movement, continuously performs eccentric contractions to absorb body weight and ground reaction forces during single-leg landings.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球跨步（Lunge）動作中的膝蓋穩定器。在每一次極限救球的深蹲動作中，負責維持髕骨軌跡，防止膝蓋內扣，是預防前十字韌帶損傷的關鍵。
desc_en: The knee stabilizer during badminton lunges. Maintains proper patellar tracking and prevents knee valgus during deep squats for limit-reaching saves, critical for ACL injury prevention.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球防守轉身或側身擊球時，負責穩定髖關節。協助控制單腳支撐時的骨盆旋轉，確保力量能順暢傳遞至上半身。
desc_en: Stabilizes the hip joint during defensive turns or sideways strokes in badminton. Helps control pelvic rotation during single-leg support, ensuring smooth force transfer to the upper body.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球員爆發力動作的主要推動者。在急停、變向與起跳殺球時承受巨大的離心負荷，是股四頭肌中力量最強大的部分。
desc_en: Primary driver for explosive movements in badminton. Bears immense eccentric loads during sudden stops, directional changes, and jump smashes; the most powerful component of the quadriceps.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責起跳殺球時的強力屈髖（提膝）與伸膝動作。在空中「剪刀腳」動作中，將後腿快速向前帶動，對於空中姿態控制至關重要。
desc_en: Responsible for powerful hip flexion (knee lift) and knee extension during jump smashes. Drives the rear leg forward during the 'scissor kick' motion in the air, crucial for aerial posture control.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球大跨步救球（特別是接殺球）時，限制雙腿過度外展以防拉傷。同時作為鵝足肌群，在急停轉身時穩定膝關節內側。
desc_en: Limits excessive leg abduction during wide defensive lunges (especially smash returns) to prevent strains. As part of the pes anserinus group, stabilizes the medial knee during sudden stops and turns.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽球極限救球的大跨步動作中，限制大腿過度外展以防受傷。同時協助膝關節內側的動態穩定。
desc_en: Limits excessive thigh abduction during extreme defensive lunges to prevent injury. Also assists in the dynamic stability of the medial knee joint.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球殺球力量的「隱形發動機」。負責肩關節的強力內旋，是從引拍到擊球瞬間加速揮拍速度的核心肌肉。
desc_en: The 'invisible engine' of badminton smash power. Responsible for powerful internal rotation of the shoulder, acting as the core muscle for accelerating swing speed from backswing to impact.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 連接頸部與肩胛骨。在羽毛球頻繁的抬頭擊球動作中，協助穩定頸部筋膜，並在劇烈運動呼吸急促時維持氣管周邊張力。
desc_en: Connects neck and scapula. Assists in stabilizing cervical fascia during frequent overhead shots in badminton and maintains tension around the trachea during heavy breathing in intense play.

img_source: Bildbearbetning: sv:Användare:Chrizz, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責「持拍準備姿勢」。在防守接發球時維持手肘彎曲，並在網前搓球等細膩動作中控制手臂的穩定度與精準性。
desc_en: Responsible for the 'ready position'. Maintains elbow flexion during defensive returns and controls arm stability and precision during delicate net shots.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在高遠球與殺球的「擊球點」瞬間，負責鎖定並伸直肘關節。是確保力量完全傳遞至球拍、避免肘部塌陷的耐力肌。
desc_en: Responsible for locking and extending the elbow joint at the 'impact point' of clears and smashes. An endurance muscle ensuring full force transfer to the racket, preventing elbow collapse.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球重殺（Power Smash）的爆發力來源。在揮拍末段負責極速伸展手肘，產生強大的鞭打速度，是進攻型球員的關鍵肌肉。
desc_en: Power source for the badminton Power Smash. Responsible for explosive elbow extension in the final phase of the swing, generating immense whipping speed; crucial for attacking players.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 跨越肩肘雙關節。在殺球引拍時被拉長儲存能量，隨後在揮拍過程中同時負責伸肘與伸肩，協調整個上肢的動力鏈爆發。
desc_en: Crosses both shoulder and elbow joints. Stretched during smash preparation to store energy, then simultaneously extends the elbow and shoulder during the swing, coordinating the entire upper limb kinetic chain explosion.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 肘屈曲的純粹力量。在羽球比賽中，球員需長時間舉拍保持「Ready Position」，肱肌負責對抗重力維持此姿勢，容易在長局數後疲勞。
desc_en: Pure power for elbow flexion. In badminton, players must hold the 'Ready Position' with racket up for long periods; the brachialis resists gravity to maintain this posture, prone to fatigue in long matches.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責維持前臂中立位，這正是羽毛球「握手式握拍（Shakehand Grip）」的基礎姿勢。在快速平抽擋中穩定手肘與前臂角度。
desc_en: Maintains the forearm in neutral position, the basis of the badminton 'Shakehand Grip'. Stabilizes the elbow and forearm angle during fast flat drives.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽球場上快速側向移動與併步時的主力肌群。在頻繁的急停變向中承受高張力，是羽球員鼠蹊部拉傷的高風險部位。
desc_en: Prime mover for rapid lateral movement and chasse steps on the court. Undergoes high tension during frequent stops and direction changes, making it a high-risk site for groin strains in badminton players.

img_source: Me, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 反手發球或反手挑球時，負責拇指的精確發力與頂推動作。強壯的拇指屈肌能增加反手擊球的穿透力與控制性。
desc_en: Responsible for precise thumb force and push during backhand serves or lifts. A strong flexor pollicis longus increases the penetration and control of backhand shots.

img_source: Was a bee, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在網前大跨步落地時，協助控制腳尖不上翹，並防止腳趾拖地。在頻繁的前後移動步法中，保持足部姿勢的靈活性。
desc_en: Helps control toe lift during net lunges and prevents toe drag. Maintains foot posture agility during frequent forward-backward footwork.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在跳殺落地瞬間，協助伸展腳趾以分散前腳掌的衝擊力。若鞋頭過緊或急停過多，易導致腳趾受到擠壓（羽球員常見的黑指甲問題）。
desc_en: Assists toe extension to distribute forefoot shock upon jump smash landing. Tight toe boxes or excessive sudden stops can compress toes, leading to black toenails common in badminton.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責足外翻與蹠屈，是羽毛球側向並步（Chasse）移動的關鍵動力。透過壓低第一蹠骨，為向側方快速推進提供穩固的支點。
desc_en: Responsible for eversion and plantarflexion, key power for lateral chasse steps in badminton. Depresses the first metatarsal to provide a solid fulcrum for rapid lateral propulsion.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在高強度比賽的間歇期，輔助胸式呼吸以快速恢復氧氣。若因緊張而長期聳肩，會導致此肌肉緊繃，引起上肢神經麻痛。
desc_en: Aids chest breathing for rapid oxygen recovery during high-intensity intervals. Chronic shrugging due to tension tightens this muscle, potentially causing upper limb nerve pain.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責肩胛骨的上迴旋（Upward Rotation），這是手臂能高舉過頂進行殺球的必要條件。無力的前鋸肌會導致殺球時肩關節夾擠與受傷。
desc_en: Responsible for scapular upward rotation, essential for raising the arm overhead to smash. Weak serratus anterior leads to shoulder impingement and injury during overhead strokes.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 壓力指示器。比賽關鍵分時，球員常不自覺用力咬合。學會「鬆開下顎」可以減少頸部張力，提升反應速度與動作流暢性。
desc_en: Stress indicator. Players often clench jaws during crucial points. Learning to 'unclench' reduces neck tension, improving reaction speed and movement fluidity.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在每一次擊球之間的空檔，負責手指的快速伸展放鬆。保持手指在非擊球狀態下的鬆弛，是維持整場比賽手感與爆發力的秘訣。
desc_en: Responsible for rapid finger extension and relaxation between shots. Keeping fingers loose when not hitting is the secret to maintaining touch and explosiveness throughout the match.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責食指外展。在正手握拍中，負責控制食指「扣住」拍柄的位置，對於精確控制網前小球（勾對角）的方向至關重要。
desc_en: Abducts the index finger. In forehand grip, controls the index finger's 'hook' on the handle, crucial for precise direction control in net shots like cross-court netting.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球握拍時負責中指的外展與穩定。在細膩的網前球處理中，協助中指微調拍柄角度，提升控球精準度。
desc_en: Responsible for middle finger abduction and stability in badminton grip. Assists in fine-tuning the handle angle with the middle finger during delicate net shots, enhancing control precision.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球大力扣殺時，負責無名指的穩定外展，確保手指力量能均勻分佈於拍柄，防止球拍在擊球瞬間扭轉。
desc_en: Stabilizes the ring finger in abduction during powerful smashes. Ensures finger force is evenly distributed on the handle, preventing the racket from twisting at impact.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助小指外展，是調節握拍空間的輔助肌肉。在正反手握拍快速轉換時，幫助打開掌心空間以利拍柄轉動。
desc_en: Assists little finger abduction, acting as an auxiliary muscle for adjusting grip space. Helps open the palm during rapid forehand-backhand switches to facilitate racket handle rotation.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球殺球的「發動機」。在過頂揮拍中負責強力伸展、內收與內旋手臂，將軀幹的力量經由肩部傳遞至球拍，產生巨大的下壓速度。
desc_en: The 'engine' of the badminton smash. Responsible for powerful arm extension, adduction, and internal rotation during overhead strokes, transferring trunk power through the shoulder to the racket for immense downward speed.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球反手握拍中，負責讓食指放鬆伸展以貼合寬面。靈活的食指伸展能增加握拍的槓桿力臂，提升反手擊球的控制感。
desc_en: Responsible for extending the index finger to relax along the wide bevel in the backhand grip. Flexible index extension increases the grip lever arm, enhancing backhand control.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球頻繁的交叉步（Cross Step）移動中，負責大腿的快速內收與屈曲。協助雙腿快速交替，是靈活步法的基礎肌群之一。
desc_en: Responsible for rapid thigh adduction and flexion during frequent cross steps in badminton. Assists in quick leg alternation, forming a foundational muscle group for agile footwork.

img_source: DrJanaOfficial, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 正手擊球力量鏈的前端。在平抽擋與殺球時，負責肩關節的強力內收與屈曲，將手臂快速拉向身體前方，是球速的重要來源。
desc_en: The front end of the forehand power chain. Responsible for powerful shoulder adduction and flexion during drives and smashes, pulling the arm rapidly across the body, a key source of shot speed.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 容易因長期圓肩擊球而緊繃的肌肉。其過度緊張會限制肩胛骨後收，進而影響高遠球的引拍幅度與發力順暢度。
desc_en: Prone to tightness from chronic rounded-shoulder hitting posture. Excessive tension here restricts scapular retraction, negatively affecting the backswing amplitude and fluidity of clear shots.

img_source: User:Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助穩定喉部。在激烈的多拍來回喘氣時，配合其他頸部肌肉維持氣道通暢，確保氧氣供應。
desc_en: Assists in stabilizing the larynx. During heavy panting in intense rallies, works with other neck muscles to maintain airway patency, ensuring oxygen supply.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在每一分結束後的短暫休息中，協助快速呼氣以排出廢氣，加快心率恢復，為下一分的爆發做準備。
desc_en: Assists in rapid expiration during short rests between points to expel stale air, speeding up heart rate recovery and preparing for the next burst of effort.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責頭部的快速轉動以追蹤高速飛行的羽球。在網前快速封網或後場回頭看球時，提供頸部的靈活轉動與穩定。
desc_en: Responsible for rapid head rotation to track the high-speed shuttlecock. Provides neck flexibility and stability during quick net kills or when looking back for rear-court shots.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球「手指發力」的協調者。負責食指掌指關節屈曲與指間關節伸展，使手指能靈活地進行「扣」、「撥」等細微控球動作。
desc_en: Coordinator of badminton 'finger power'. Flexes the index MCP joint and extends IP joints, enabling flexible finger actions like 'hooking' or 'flicking' for subtle control.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助中指在擊球瞬間快速屈曲握緊拍柄。在正手殺球時，與其他手指協同作用，將鬆弛的握拍瞬間轉化為緊固的擊球點。
desc_en: Assists the middle finger in rapidly flexing to grip the handle at impact. During forehand smashes, coordinates with other fingers to instantly transform a loose grip into a solid impact point.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 無名指是力量傳導的重要一環。此肌肉幫助維持無名指在握拍時的自然弧度，確保在發力時能提供穩定的支撐。
desc_en: The ring finger is crucial for force transmission. This muscle helps maintain the ring finger's natural arch during gripping, ensuring stable support during power generation.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助小指進行精細的屈伸控制。在變換握拍或進行假動作（Deception）時，靈活的小指動作往往能欺騙對手重心。
desc_en: Assists in fine flexion/extension control of the little finger. Flexible little finger movements during grip changes or deceptive shots often help trick the opponent's center of gravity.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在防守接殺球時協助快速提肩。但過度緊張的聳肩習慣會限制殺球的發力流暢度，球員應學會擊球瞬間「沉肩」以釋放力量。
desc_en: Assists rapid shoulder elevation during smash defense. However, habitual tense shrugging restricts smash power fluidity; players should learn to 'drop the shoulders' at impact to release force.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球員肩部健康的守護神。負責下壓與穩定肩胛骨，對抗上斜方肌張力，確保過頂擊球時肩關節有足夠的活動空間，預防夾擠。
desc_en: Guardian of shoulder health for badminton players. Depresses and stabilizes the scapula, countering upper trapezius tension, ensuring sufficient subacromial space during overhead shots to prevent impingement.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在殺球引拍（擴胸）階段負責肩胛骨後收。強壯的中斜方肌能讓球員充分打開胸廓，增加揮拍距離與擊球力量。
desc_en: Responsible for scapular retraction during the smash preparation (chest expansion). Strong middle trapezius allows players to fully open the chest, increasing swing arc and shot power.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助前臂旋前。在正手殺球與平抽擋中，與旋前方形肌共同作用，產生強烈的內旋扭力，是羽毛球擊球速度的來源之一。
desc_en: Assists forearm pronation. Works with the pronator quadratus during forehand smashes and drives to generate strong internal rotation torque, a source of badminton shot speed.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責前臂旋後。在反手擊球與網前搓球（外旋搓）中至關重要，提供細膩的旋轉控制力。
desc_en: Responsible for forearm supination. Crucial in backhand shots and net spinning shots (external spin), providing delicate rotational control.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽球大角度轉身與跨步時，穩定髖關節。若過度緊繃壓迫坐骨神經，會影響下肢的靈活度與爆發力（梨狀肌症候群）。
desc_en: Stabilizes the hip during wide-angle turns and lunges in badminton. If overly tight and compressing the sciatic nerve, it impairs lower limb agility and explosiveness (Piriformis Syndrome).

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責指尖的強力扣握。在殺球瞬間，四指（除拇指外）的快速收縮鎖緊拍柄，是將揮拍動能轉化為擊球質量的最後一環。
desc_en: Responsible for powerful fingertip gripping. At the moment of a smash, the rapid contraction of the four fingers (excluding thumb) locks the handle, the final link in converting swing energy into shot quality.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助維持輕鬆的握拍（Loose Grip）。在擊球前的準備階段，保持半握狀態，讓手指隨時準備進行爆發性的屈曲發力。
desc_en: Assists in maintaining a Loose Grip. Keeps the hand semi-closed during preparation, ensuring fingers are ready for explosive flexion at any moment.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽毛球大跨步落地時（Heel Strike），負責腳踝的離心控制，防止腳掌重拍地面。同時在後退步法中負責勾起腳尖，避免因鞋頭觸地而絆倒。
desc_en: Responsible for eccentric ankle control during the heel strike of a badminton lunge, preventing foot slap. Also dorsiflexes the foot during backward footwork to prevent tripping over the toe box.

img_source: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/df/Inferior_view_of_tibialis_posterior_muscle_-_animation.gif
desc: 羽毛球員的「足弓懸吊系統」。在頻繁的跳躍與側向急停中，負責維持足弓高度，吸收落地衝擊，是預防脛前疼痛與足底筋膜炎的關鍵。
desc_en: The 'arch suspension system' for badminton players. Maintains arch height and absorbs landing shock during frequent jumps and lateral stops, critical for preventing shin splints and plantar fasciitis.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在單腳跨步救球時，微調股骨頭的位置。作為髖關節深層穩定肌，防止膝蓋在極限動作中內扣（Valgus），保護半月板與韌帶。
desc_en: Fine-tunes femoral head position during single-leg lunges. As a deep hip stabilizer, it prevents knee valgus during extreme movements, protecting the meniscus and ligaments.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助穩定髖臼內的股骨頭。在羽毛球快速變向與轉身防守中，提供深層關節的本體感覺與穩定性。
desc_en: Stabilizes the femoral head within the acetabulum. Provides deep joint proprioception and stability during rapid directional changes and defensive turns in badminton.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助肩關節屈曲與內收。在正手平抽擋或殺球隨揮階段，幫助手臂穩定地向身體中線靠攏。
desc_en: Assists shoulder flexion and adduction. Helps stabilize the arm towards the midline during forehand drives or the follow-through phase of a smash.

img_source: Henry Gray, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 輔助屈腕。在殺球瞬間用力扣腕時，此肌腱會明顯浮起。雖非主要動力來源，但協助收緊掌腱膜以穩固握拍。
desc_en: Assists wrist flexion. The tendon becomes prominent during the forceful wrist snap of a smash. While not a primary power source, it helps tighten the palmar aponeurosis to stabilize the grip.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責食指內收。在握拍時，協助食指緊貼拍柄側面，這對於控制拍面角度（特別是正手小球）至關重要。
desc_en: Adducts the index finger. Helps keep the index finger snug against the handle side, crucial for controlling racket face angle, especially in forehand net shots.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責無名指內收。協助手指併攏以形成緊湊的握拍結構，確保擊球力量不外洩。
desc_en: Adducts the ring finger. Helps gather fingers to form a compact grip structure, ensuring no leakage of hitting power.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責小指內收。在羽球握拍中，小指與無名指的緊密配合是後三指發力（Power Grip）的基礎。
desc_en: Adducts the little finger. In badminton gripping, the close coordination of the little and ring fingers forms the foundation of the 'Power Grip'.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 加深手掌杯狀結構。在用力握拍擊球時，協助繃緊小魚際區的皮膚與筋膜，增強手掌對拍柄的摩擦力與穩定性。
desc_en: Deepens the cupped palm structure. During forceful gripping, tightens the skin and fascia of the hypothenar eminence, increasing friction and stability against the racket handle.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 骨盆底的核心支撐。在羽球起跳殺球或跨步落地時，反射性收縮以增加腹內壓，穩定脊椎並保護臟器免受衝擊。
desc_en: Core support of the pelvic floor. Reflexively contracts during jump smashes or lunge landings to increase intra-abdominal pressure, stabilizing the spine and protecting organs from impact.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 過度緊張的來源。羽球員常因長時間仰頭看球或緊張聳肩而導致此肌肉僵硬。放鬆它有助於改善頸部靈活度與揮拍流暢性。
desc_en: Source of excessive tension. Badminton players often suffer stiffness here from prolonged looking up or nervous shrugging. Relaxing it improves neck flexibility and swing fluidity.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 肩袖肌群之一，負責啟動外展。在羽球過頂揮拍中，負責將肱骨頭穩定在關節窩內，預防因頻繁殺球導致的肩夾擠症候群。
desc_en: A rotator cuff muscle responsible for initiating abduction. Stabilizes the humeral head in the socket during overhead strokes, preventing shoulder impingement from frequent smashing.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責羽球殺球前的「倒拍」動作（外旋）。同時在揮拍結束後的隨揮階段，負責讓手臂減速，是預防肩部投擲傷害的關鍵剎車系統。
desc_en: Responsible for the 'racket drop' (external rotation) before a smash. Acts as the key braking system during the follow-through to decelerate the arm, preventing throwing injuries.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽球場上的併步（Chasse）與交叉步中，協助大腿快速併攏。在單腳支撐救球時，提供骨盆底部的穩定性。
desc_en: Assists rapid thigh adduction during chasse and cross steps on the court. Provides pelvic stability during single-leg support for defensive saves.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 支撐縱向足弓的關鍵。在羽球高頻率的跳躍與落地中，透過抓地動作增強足部剛性，提升推進效率並預防足底筋膜受損。
desc_en: Key longitudinal arch supporter. During high-frequency jumps and landings, strengthens foot rigidity via gripping action, improving propulsion efficiency and preventing plantar fascia damage.

name_zh: 腓骨長肌（重複項-請參照Peroneus Longus）
img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球側向移動的動力源。透過壓低第一蹠骨，為向側方蹬地提供穩固支點，同時像扣帶一樣鎖緊足弓以利力量傳導。
desc_en: Power source for lateral movement. Depresses the first metatarsal to provide a solid fulcrum for lateral push-off, while locking the arch like a strap for efficient force transfer.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 腳踝外側的守門員。在羽球激烈的側向急停中，負責快速對抗內翻力矩，是預防腳踝扭傷（翻腳刀）的最前線肌肉。
desc_en: Goalkeeper of the lateral ankle. Reacts rapidly to counteract inversion torque during intense lateral stops in badminton, acting as the frontline muscle against ankle sprains.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽球跳殺的爆發力引擎。快縮肌比例高，負責提供瞬間的垂直彈跳力。在未熱身完全時進行爆發性移動，容易發生拉傷（網球腿）。
desc_en: Explosive engine for jump smashes. High fast-twitch fiber content provides instantaneous vertical jump power. Prone to strains (tennis leg) during explosive movements if not fully warmed up.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責起跳殺球時的高抬腿動作。強壯的腰大肌能將大腿快速拉向軀幹，增加滯空時間與核心力量的傳遞效率。
desc_en: Responsible for high knee lifts during jump smashes. A strong psoas major pulls the thigh rapidly towards the trunk, increasing hang time and core power transfer efficiency.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在被動側身救球（Overhead Side Reach）時穩定腰椎。協助骨盆在跳躍與落地時的水平穩定，防止因核心無力導致的下背痛。
desc_en: Stabilizes the lumbar spine during passive overhead side reaches. Assists horizontal pelvic stability during jumps and landings, preventing lower back pain caused by core weakness.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 軀幹旋轉的輔助肌。在殺球時，與對側腹外斜肌協同收縮，將轉體力量精確傳導至手臂，並在擊球後協助身體減速。
desc_en: Assistant for trunk rotation. During smashes, contracts synergistically with the contralateral external oblique to precisely transfer rotational force to the arm and decelerate the body after the shot.

img_source: Par Henry Vandyke Carter, CC0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽球殺球力量鏈的核心環節。負責產生強大的軀幹旋轉與屈曲力矩，將引拍時儲存的彈性位能釋放為擊球速度。
desc_en: Core link in the badminton smash power chain. Generates powerful trunk rotation and flexion torque, releasing elastic potential energy stored during the backswing into shot speed.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責殺球時的「收腹」動作（軀幹屈曲）。在空中擊球瞬間猛力收縮，像一張弓一樣將上半身彈向前方，增加擊球的下壓角度與力量。
desc_en: Responsible for the 'crunch' (trunk flexion) during a smash. Contracts forcefully at the moment of aerial impact, snapping the upper body forward like a bow to increase downward angle and power.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 人體的天然護腰。在每一次起跳、落地與急停前預先收縮（Bracing），增加腹內壓以穩定脊椎，是預防羽球腰傷的基礎。
desc_en: The body's natural corset. Pre-contracts (Bracing) before every jump, landing, and stop to increase intra-abdominal pressure and stabilize the spine, fundamental for preventing badminton back injuries.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 膝關節的解鎖鑰匙。在膝蓋伸直鎖定後，負責啟動屈曲。在羽球側向移動中，限制股骨外旋，保護後十字韌帶（PCL）。
desc_en: The key to unlocking the knee. Initiates flexion from a locked extension. In lateral badminton movements, limits femoral external rotation, protecting the posterior cruciate ligament (PCL).

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責殺球引拍時的「反弓」動作（脊椎伸展）。提供強大的背部張力，隨後釋放以產生爆發力。同時在防守低手接球時保護脊椎。
desc_en: Responsible for the 'back arch' (spinal extension) during smash preparation. Provides immense back tension, released for explosive power. Also protects the spine during low defensive scoops.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 正手殺球與快速平抽的動力來源。負責屈腕與橈偏，與其他屈肌協同產生快速的拍頭加速度。
desc_en: Power source for forehand smashes and fast drives. Responsible for wrist flexion and radial deviation, working with other flexors to generate rapid racket head acceleration.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 反手擊球的主力肌。負責手腕的強力伸展與橈偏（Radial Deviation），是反手高遠球與平抽擋產生鞭打速度的關鍵。
desc_en: Prime mover for backhand shots. Responsible for powerful wrist extension and radial deviation, key to generating whip speed in backhand clears and drives.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 穩定手腕背伸姿勢。長期且高強度的反手擊球容易導致此肌腱起點發炎，即俗稱的「網球肘」（外上髁炎）。
desc_en: Stabilizes wrist extension. Chronic, high-intensity backhand strokes often cause inflammation at this muscle's origin, known as 'Tennis Elbow' (lateral epicondylitis).

img_source: 3d4medical, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 呼吸與核心穩定的總指揮。在激烈多拍中維持供氧，同時透過腹內壓支撐軀幹。良好的呼吸控制能延緩疲勞並提升擊球專注度。
desc_en: Conductor of respiration and core stability. Maintains oxygen supply during rallies and supports the trunk via intra-abdominal pressure. Good breathing control delays fatigue and improves shot focus.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 頸部的深層穩定肌。在羽球高頻率抬頭與轉頭中，負責維持頸椎的正確排列，防止因表層肌肉代償引起的頸痛。
desc_en: Deep cervical stabilizer. Maintains proper cervical spine alignment during frequent head lifting and turning in badminton, preventing neck pain caused by superficial muscle compensation.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責髖外旋與屈膝。在羽球防守時的「開放式站姿（Open Stance）」中，協助大腿向外打開以擴大防守面積。
desc_en: Responsible for hip external rotation and knee flexion. Assists in opening the thigh outwards during the badminton 'Open Stance' defense, expanding the defensive coverage area.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽球場上的力量之王。負責大跨步後將身體推回中心（髖伸展），以及起跳殺球時產生強大的垂直推進力。
desc_en: King of power on the badminton court. Responsible for pushing the body back to center after a deep lunge (hip extension) and generating immense vertical propulsion for jump smashes.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與臀中肌協同，穩定骨盆。在單腳落地或轉身時，防止髖關節過度側傾，確保下肢力量傳遞的軸線正確。
desc_en: Works with gluteus medius to stabilize the pelvis. Prevents excessive lateral hip tilt during single-leg landings or turns, ensuring proper axial alignment for lower limb force transmission.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 單腳跨步救球時的骨盆穩定器。防止膝蓋內扣（Valgus），對於預防羽球員常見的前十字韌帶（ACL）損傷至關重要。
desc_en: Pelvic stabilizer during single-leg lunges. Prevents knee valgus, critical for preventing Anterior Cruciate Ligament (ACL) injuries common in badminton players.

img_source: colorized by Michael Gasperl, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在羽球場上頻繁的側向移動中，透過髂脛束穩定膝關節外側。若臀肌無力，此肌肉易過勞緊繃，導致膝外側疼痛（羽球員常見傷病）。
desc_en: Stabilizes the lateral knee via the IT Band during frequent lateral movements on court. If glutes are weak, this muscle is prone to overuse tightness, leading to lateral knee pain (common in badminton).

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 穩定胸鎖關節。在反覆的過頂揮拍中，保護鎖骨與肩胛骨的連接穩定，微調肩帶動作。
desc_en: Stabilizes the sternoclavicular joint. Protects the connection between the clavicle and scapula during repetitive overhead strokes, fine-tuning shoulder girdle movements.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與腰大肌共同組成髂腰肌。在網前上網步法中，負責快速將後腿向前帶出（屈髖），是啟動速度的關鍵。
desc_en: Forms the iliopsoas with the psoas major. In net-approach footwork, responsible for rapidly pulling the rear leg forward (hip flexion), crucial for initiation speed.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 羽毛球員的「核心驅動軸」。負責起跳殺球時的高抬腿，以及全場移動中的每一次跨步啟動，其爆發力直接決定了覆蓋場地的速度。
desc_en: The 'core drive shaft' for badminton players. Responsible for high knee lifts in jump smashes and every step initiation in full-court movement; its explosiveness directly dictates court coverage speed.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 咀嚼肌之一。比賽關鍵時刻球員容易咬緊牙關，導致顳肌緊繃並引發緊張性頭痛。保持下顎放鬆有助於維持冷靜的判斷力。
desc_en: A muscle of mastication. Players often clench teeth during critical points, causing temporalis tension and tension headaches. Keeping the jaw relaxed helps maintain cool judgment.
